DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ENERGY
DOC.TEXT: OPEC Leaves Production Quotas Unchanged : Believing it has found the key to higher prices , the cartel left untouched its crude production levels for the rest of 1994 . In adopting a hands-off policy , the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries is gambling that oil prices will continue rallying in the fall and winter , with increased demand for crude in the United States and elsewhere.Oil prices tumbled late last year to their lowest levels in five years . But since the cartel agreed in March to cap its output at 24.5 million barrels a day through the end of the year , the price of the U.S. benchmark grade of oil has gained more_than $ 5 a barrel . Crude_oil prices rose sharply Wednesday , reaching their highest level in more_than a year and flirting_with the $ 20-a-barrel mark .
